Translations.Text: Then does he not know, that when that which is in the graves is exposed
and that which is in the bosoms is made to appear (i.e. secrets are revealed)
certainly on that day, their Fosterer is fully informed about them
The calamity
What is the calamity
And what will make you realize what the calamity is? (It will befall on)
the day when mankind will be like scattered moths
and the mountains will be like loosened wool
Then as for him whose weights (of good deeds) are heavy
then he will lead a life of pleasure
And as for him whose weights (of good deeds) are light
then his home* will be in a deep pit (of hell). * Destination
And what will make you realize what the (deep pit of hell) is
(It is a) very hot fire
Rivalry in worldly increase distracts you (from the remembrance of Allah)
till you come to the graves
No, you will know
Again, no, you will know
No, if you know (having) the knowledge that is certain
you will definitely see hell fire
Then you will definitely see it with the eye of certainty
Then on that day you will definitely be questioned about the comforts
By the time (i.e. historic time is witness that)
Man is certainly at a loss
except those who believe and do righteous works and recommend to one another, the truth, and recommend to one another, patience
Sorrowful is the state of every slanderer, defamer
who accumulates wealth and keeps on counting it
He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal
No, he will definitely be flung into the crushing one
And what will make you realize what the crushing one is
(It is the) fire of Allah, kindled
which is made to rise over the hearts
it will certainly be closed on them
in columns that are stretched
Did you not consider, how your Fosterer dealt with the owners of the elephant
Did He not make their plot useless
and send on them flocks of flying creatures
who pelted them with stones of baked clay
so that He made them like eaten up straw (husk)
For the taming of Quraysh
their taming in equipping caravans (for traveling) in winter and summer
so let them serve the Fosterer of this house (Kaaba)
Who has fed them in hunger and given them security from fear
Did you see him who belies religion
Then he is the one who pushes away the orphan
and does not urge on the feeding of the poor
So sorrowful is the state of the worshippers
who are heedless of their worship (salat)
(in the sense that they are) those who make a show (of their worship)
and refuse small kindness
We certainly gave you abundance
so worship your Fosterer and sacrifice
The one who hates you, he is certainly without posterity
Say, “O Infidels
I do not serve (worship) that which you serve (worship)
And you are not servers of that which I serve
And I am not a server of that which you serve
And you are not servers of that which I serve
For you your religion (or judgment) and for me my religion (or judgment).”
When Allah's help and the victory comes
and you see people enter the religion of Allah in troops
then glorify your Fosterer by praising Him and seek His protective forgiveness. He is certainly the Accepter of repentance
May the hands of Abu Lahab perish. And may he perish
His wealth and that which he earned will not save him
He will enter flaming fire
and his wife (too who is a) carrier of fire-wood
In her neck (there will be) a rope of palm-fibre
Say, “Allah is One
Allah is He on Whom all depend
He does not beget and He is not begotten
And there is no one equal to Him.”
Say, “I seek the protection of the Fosterer of the day break
from the evil of that which He has created
and from the evil of the darkness (of night) when it overspreads
and from the evil of women blowing in the knots (practicing witchcraft)
and from the evil of the envier when he envies.”
Say, “I seek the protection of the Fosterer of mankind
the King of mankind
the God of mankind
from the evil of the whisperings of (the devil), he who (whispers and then) withdraws
who whispers into the bosoms (hearts or minds) of mankind
from among the jinn and mankind.”
